description: Having become one of the world leaders in the domain of 3D graphics cards, Hercules has developed and exploited its fields of expertise in a variety of fast-growing market segments over the years. Hercules currently offers a complete range of webcams, speaker systems, digital DJing devices, WiFi solutions, iPod/iTunes accessories and sound cards. Hercules launches compelling products which have been fastidiously researched in terms of performance and produced with quality in mind. Hercules XPS 2.0 30 - Black (4769188) 2.0 Speaker set. Manufactured with high-performance components and with a smooth finish these 2.0 speakers guarantee a high-quality sound emission. Exclusive compact design. Total power output: 12 W RMS (2 x 6 W). Peak power: 24 W. Satellite featuring a gold-plated audio connector (not wall mountable). Speakers equipped with magnetic shielding for an interference-free environment. Line In input at the back of the speaker for connecting the main audio source, and auxiliary input for connecting MP3 players etc. Stereo headphones connector located on the right-hand side of the speaker. All switches and knobs are located on the front of the speaker: General volume control knob with standby position and treble volume control knob. External power supply allowing the maximum space possible within the casing for the sound to develop. Satellite measurements: 19 cm (H) x 10 cm (W) x 12 cm (D).
title: Hercules XPS 2.0 30 Multimedia Speakers
